spiritsExplanation:
The workout video titled "25 Minute Intermediate Full Body Elliptical Workout" predominantly embodies the "Structured & Disciplined" spirit with high confidence. The description and workout breakdown highlight a precise and methodical structure: resistance levels are progressively increased and varied to target different body areas, notably "upper body focus" and "lower body focus". This punctuated progression and specified resistance targets align closely with a disciplined approach.

Additionally, elements of "High-Energy & Intense" are present, receiving a moderate to strong score. The description mentions the use of an elliptical and the prompting to "start getting your sweat on today!", coupled with user comments describing the workout as "energizing", and "exhilarating", indicating significant intensity, albeit not at the peak levels required for the highest score.

Other spirits, such as "Flow & Rhythm" and "Soothing & Restorative", were considered but not selected due to the lack of emphasis on continuous flow, relaxation, or recovery; the workout primarily aims at structured intensity and progression.
